Observed at: Esquimalt Harbour 7:00 PM PDT Sunday 9 April 2023
Temperature: 9.2°C

Humidity: 79 %

entry.title: Sunday night: Rain. Low plus 5.
entry.summary: Rain ending early this evening then mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers before morning. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 except west 60 gusting to 80 near Juan de Fuca Strait early this evening. Wind becoming west 20 gusting to 40 this evening then light near midnight. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Sunday 9 April 2023
